attributes.title: terrible.

attributes.title: Rodrick Heffley
attributes.review: This app is horrible. It literally brought back the plagues of ancient Egypt upon my people. I’m so sick of it. I installed it, and I was cursed to turn into an ogre every night. I’m so upset. This app caused the return of Sheev Palpatine. I don’t even know what to do, we can’t find the door to Narnia and Dumbledore isn’t taking my calls. I’ve never seen a worse app.

attributes.title: This app is racist sexist and is American propaganda
attributes.review: This app was the worst. The only thing it did was teach me how wrong The Trump administration really is. It shows how little empathy they have to actual human beings and they’re letting millions of people die. It also shows how they don’t care for humanity and only care for money. This app is rotten and should not be allowed on the App Store.

attributes.title: The app is useless
attributes.review: It terrible it took a while to download but I didn’t want to answer it all and up glitching and end up even worse then there was this update and then it just went completely out of nowhere it didn’t work just like the comic book guy from The Simpsons worst app ever

attributes.title: HORRIBLE DONT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: It’s to weeks to download and while it’s was downloading it’s wouldn’t let me play any other games and once it did download I pressed on it and it’s logged me off my hole phone! So I had to long back into my phone and when I went to go press on it my phone started glitching for two days and know I can’t delete it. DONT GET THIS APP IST HORRIBLE!

attributes.title: 🤢🤮don’t download
attributes.review: i downloaded this app on my phone, in hopes of furthering my fascist views, but the app crawled out of my phone and gave me AIDS?! i thought that was the end of it, but it gave my phone viruses as well and now i cant even open my phone without getting assaulted with his orange face. would rate 0/5 if i could, turned me into a communist.

attributes.title: Cheeto Puff Man
attributes.review: This app is awful. When i opened the app last tuesday a man with a trump 2020 app ad came up into my house and stabbed me with a carrot repeatedly. Then he grabbed my 3 year old son and swung him like a rag doll between two horses that he brought. While this man left my home he grabbed my mother’s ashes and a spoon. He poured milk into the ashes and began to eat them. Overall a horrible app.

attributes.title: Do not like the app
attributes.review: When i downloaded the app it made my phone so slow and made it glitch terribly. Everything disappeared from my phone. All my apps, pictures, messages, and contacts. I very much do not recommend this app because it will completely ruin your celular device.

attributes.title: Trump is racist
attributes.review: Trump does not care about anyone but himself and people like him (rich white men) he doesn’t care about minorities, people of color, females, poor people, people with disabilities (both physical and mental), immigrants, or middle class workers. Unless you are the top 1% of America, you’re kidding yourself if you think trump cares about you or your rights. #dumptrump2020

attributes.title: The Next Generation
attributes.review: We do in fact do our research, we have opened this app and have seen the flaws of it and our president. We see that it is broken and doesn’t work properly, it glitches all the time. This is not a working app and should be taken down immediately.
